text: "True" is a 1983 pop ballad from British group Spandau Ballet. The song was released in April 1983. It was a worldwide hit. It hit #1 on many charts. It hit #4 on the Billboard Hot 100. It was #1 on the Adult Contemporary chart for one week. There are several versions of this song. One lasts six and a half minutes. Category:1983 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Spandau Ballet songs Category:Blue-eyed soul songs
title: True (Spandau Ballet song)
